title: The Lost and the Hunted
description: An Eden Academy Prequel****** This is BOOK TWO of the Lost and the Hunted. ******Book One can only be found in the Wicked Souls Box Set, available on Kindle.Reese is one of the youngest billionaires on the Fortune 500. But his money means nothing when he can't use it to save the girl he loves, his child or his best friend.He is going to have to turn to mysterious allies if he is going to save his family. But he will save them. Even if he has to raze the world to do it.THE LOST AND THE HUNTED is a 40,000 word novella sequel to THE LOST AND THE HUNTED: BOOK ONE. It cannot be read standalone. This is a reverse harem shifter romance, with swearing, action and a few tense scenes.
author: Grace McGinty
